alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Madison and northeastern Gallatin Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 604 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from 11 miles southwest of Manhattan to 18 miles northeast of Ennis to 26 miles south of Belgrade to 15 miles south of Bozeman. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Church Hill and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
